execute.statement: create table TAB (ID integer primary key, NAME char(20), SURNAME char(20))
create unique index NAME_INDEX on TAB (NAME ASC, SURNAME DESC)
rename index NAME_INDEX on TAB to INDEX_NAME

check.select: select * from DOMAIN.INDEXES where SCHEMANAME = '[USER]' AND OWNER = '[USER]' AND TABLENAME = 'TAB' AND INDEXNAME = 'INDEX_NAME'
select * from DOMAIN.INDEXES where SCHEMANAME = '[USER]' AND OWNER = '[USER]' AND TABLENAME = 'TAB' AND INDEXNAME = 'NAME_INDEX'
